name: Cute Gojira
description:
Help Baby Godzilla fight his first monster!

This game was made for the 2017 Global Game jam. The game was slightly modified for the itch.io release.

Keyboard controls:

Move left and right: A, D

Move up: W

Shoot fireball: Space

The Team:

Andy Gergel

Arielle Ferre

Austin Huebner

Scott Thomas

E.J. Schroeder

Clayton Belcher

Link to Global Game Jam page: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/kawaii-gojira
